title: recordings are only sounds
body: Hey, so i recorded about 15 seconds of a replay and i watched it in highlights in lol client and it worked fine, but when i try to open the file in my computer in the highlights file, its just sound with new video. what to do?????

replies.body: It might have something to do with the media player that you're using. I've seen some other players having problems with windows media player not playing highlights correctly. Let's try a different player, and let me know if that helps at all!

I recommend [VLC Media Play.](http://www.videolan.org/)

Caution: You're about to enter the Media Zone!

http://www.intercontinentalchallenge.eu/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/vlc-player-300x140.jpg
Thanks guys, VLC did work, but the quality is bad.... why?

You can improve the quality of the recording by a limited amount by playing around with video settings in the replay. You would need to re-record your replay for improved quality.

Under the "Highlights Video Recording Settings" in the image below, adjust what you can.

https://puu.sh/vv9EG/046404eaa4.png
Oh ok, Thank yo so much man!

Welcomed, gotta give credit to Deep Terror Nami for assisting me with this case! 

<3 DTN
